        name - the name of the player

        playerID - the turn/player id of the player
        debug - set to true for debugging or testing
        strategy - the strategy the bot is using

        Decides which country to attack . Bot implementation
        Specified by:
        attack in interface IPlayer
        Overrides:
        attack in class PlayerModel
        Returns:
